personas.name: Default User
personas.description: Standard user with balanced features and moderate access

personas.name: Power User
personas.description: Advanced user with enhanced features and analytics access

personas.name: Admin User
personas.description: Full access to all features with administrative capabilities

personas.name: Basic User
personas.description: Limited access user with minimal features

personas.name: Guest User
personas.description: Temporary access user with read-only permissions
